typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ItemSKU as string,
		Description as string,
		DefaultPrice as double,
		modificationDate as string,
		IteminStock as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> VismaExtraTest
VismaExtraTest alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PimcoreID as string,
		ItemSKU as string,
		Description as string,
		ItemOfferPrice as double,
		ItemVAT as string,
		ItemCostPrice as double,
		ItemSalePrice as double,
		EnableWebShop as string,
		PrimaryBarcode as string,
		SecondaryBarcode as string,
		VismaModificationDate as string,
		PIMmodificationDate as string,
		UpdateDate as timestamp,
		ItemInStock as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ItemSKU'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemSKU,
		ItemInStock = IteminStock
	)) ~> sinkExtraTest
